sections.heading: Exemption

As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Criminal activity” means to commit, to attempt to commit, to conspire to commit, or to solicit, coerce, or intimidate another person to commit:(a)Any crime that is chargeable by indictment or information under the following provisions:1
